resources.string: Your system is infected. To remove the malware please select it and confirm the uninstall in the following dialog.
It is possible that unwanted software has been found on your system. To remove it, please select the entry and confirm the uninstall in the following dialog.
The file you are attempting to install is infected. To remove it, please select the malware and confirm the uninstall in the following dialog.
Shows which permissions are used how often.
"Scan completed successfully. No malware was found."
"Scan completed successfully. No malware was found."
Select the type of virus scan.
To run a scan, select the type of virus scan and confirm with Start.
An error occurred, please contact G DATA support
I have lost my access data
You might want to take a look at our new product:
We have installed many more functions here to make your mobile device even more secure.
Visit our page in the Google Play Store for more information
"Your device is no longer protected against current threats. Extend your license now. Your device will be protected again immediately!"
\##app_name## will let you know once the purchase process has been completed in the background and your account has been activated.
By purchasing a subscription you get access to the premium functions of Internet Security as well as access to regular updates. Billing via mobile phone bill.
Buy on the G DATA website
Billing via your mobile phone bill
I am a new customer and want to register with the G DATA update server.
I want to log in with my G DATA user name and password.

In order to activate your update access, enter your access data (user name and password) for the G DATA update server. If you do not have any access data yet, please use your registration number to register with the G DATA update server.
In the event of information being incomplete or incorrect, G DATA reserves the right to block access to online updates without prior notification. Fields marked * are required.
I agree that the data I have entered and data generated by my use may be stored and used for advertising addressed to me.
I agree that the data provided by me as well as any data generated though the use of this application may be stored, used and shared with oem_partner_company for promotional offers targeted at me.
Please enter your registration number and contact data. The access data for your signature updates will then be automatically entered in ##app_name## and also sent to your email address.
Please enter the access data for regular updates under User name and Password.
I have already purchased ##app_name## including updates or another G DATA product and want to activate the update access.
I have installed a free version of ##app_name## (without updates) and am interested in a license for loading updates.
The number of mobile malware programs is constantly increasing. Regular updates will keep you permanently protected against malware that will appear in the future.
Manage your device easily in the ActionCenter http://ac.gdata.de
Please permit access to the location to ensure functioning of location-specific locking.
Enable updates in order to stay protected against current mobile threats.
Selection has been added to app protection
If you disable permissions, ##app_name## cannot lock or wipe clean lost devices.
Lost devices cannot be locked or wiped clean as permissions have been disabled.
Do you want to reject or correct your modifications?
Also send responses to SMS commands to the following email address:
Responses to SMS commands (e.g. location data) are sent via SMS back to the device from which the command was sent. You can also receive responses via email. To do so, enter your email address here.
The email address you entered does not have a valid format.
Please choose another password. The password you entered is insecure.
The numbers you entered do not match.
The passwords you entered do not match.

This display shows which commands you can send to your device via SMS. Responses are sent to the device from which the SMS command was sent. If you have entered an email address, responses will also be sent via email.

password lock

Locks the screen (standby).
If no password has been set up for locking the screen, the password for SMS commands is automatically used.

remote password reset: new password

Reset password for SMS commands. This command must be sent from the preset telephone number.

password ring

Plays a ringtone. This is switched off after the application has been launched or unlocked.

password set device password: device password

Sets a password for locking the screen. You can then send the command lock to activate the lock.

password wipe

Resets the device to factory settings. All data is deleted.
Has your device been lost or stolen?

"What happens when your device is lost or stolen? In this event you can launch an action on your device by sending an SMS. For example, you can be sent the location of the device or delete all personal data on the device so it does not fall into the wrong hands."
The SIM card in your device has been changed. Please press here to register the new SIM card.
Select this option to hear an alarm whenever the headset is disconnected:
Locate device when battery is low and send position data to the registered number/email address.
When your battery is empty and the device is off it can no longer be located.Therefore we recommend using automatic localization whenever the battery status is low:
Send your device an SMS command with the following password to locate it or protect your data (at least four different, non-consecutive digits):

SMS commands are password-protected so that strangers cannot launch any actions on your device.The password is also used for app protection, which you can use to prevent unauthorized persons from launching protected applications on your device.
Forgot password? Reset it via SMS command using the following telephone number. Alert SMS when SIM card is changed will be sent to this number.
Lost your device and forgotten the password for SMS commands? You can enter the telephone number of someone you trust (e.g. your partner) here. You can use this number to reset the password via SMS.
This command is only executed if a telephone number has been set for it.
Do you want to save or reject your modifications?
If you have lost your device or it has been stolen, you can launch an action by sending an SMS. Select the actions that can be launched via SMS command.
If your device has been stolen and the thief is using a new SIM card, you can no longer send SMS commands to your device. Select here what should happen if the SIM card is changed.
Please press here if you are planning to change the SIM card.
Switch your device off now and insert the new SIM card. After restarting it will be registered for theft protection.
The SIM card in your device has been changed. Please press here to complete the process.

"Dear Customer,
You have successfully configured your email address. Many thanks.
With kind regards, G DATA Software AG"
The email could not be sent. Please check the Internet connection and the email address.
The test email was successfully sent!
The Lost/Stolen/Private Sphere function may be compromised by the #app# apps.
The Lost/Stolen/Private Sphere function may be compromised by the #app# app.
This app can access the following functions on your device:
The Accessibility Service enables faster, secure reaction times for app protection
Send password to the preset email address or answer the security question?

Information on blocked and/or approved apps: if ##app_name## has been configured for management via a Mobile Management Server (MMS), access to individual apps can be blocked or, if access to all apps is blocked by default, granted by the MMS administrator.
Access approval for the app can be requested from the administrator in the dialog window blocking the launch of the app. He/she will decide on the approval.
No apps are currently blocked. If necessary protect applications by using a password.
Press the + icon in the title bar to select the apps you want to block.
Press the + icon in the title bar to select the apps you want to approve.
No apps are currently blocked. If necessary, protect applications with a password.
No apps are currently approved. If necessary you can ask the administrator for approval when an app is launched.
Access to this application has been blocked by the administrator.
Do you want to reject or correct your modifications?
Forgot password? Your device can send the password to the following email address:

"Dear Customer,
Your password for application protection is #code#.
With kind regards, G DATA Software AG"
The email could not be sent. Please check the Internet connection and the email address in the settings.
If you have forgotten your password, you can send an email with the password to the following address from your device.
The email address you entered does not have a valid format.
Please enter an answer to the security question first.
Please enter your own security question first.
Please enter an email address or a security question.
Please enter and save data first.
Please choose another password. The password you entered is insecure.
The numbers you entered do not match.
The passwords you entered do not match.
Please run a test using your email address first.

Once launched and unlocked, an app remains executable for another 60 seconds after the app is terminated, without the need to enter a password. However, this only applies as long as the screen remains switched on.

"Notes on app protection:
Android apps are generally installed using the packet from the Google Play Store. A few packets contain several apps, e.g. the telephone and contacts application. These can only be protected jointly."

If an app needs permissions that could affect or deactivate the functions of the ##app_name##, it will be recommended for app protection. These might include apps that can uninstall or terminate other applications.

In certain cases app protection can be active during an uninstall. This always happens on certain devices when there is no other technically secure option for preventing the ##app_name## from being uninstalled unnoticed. Activation of the device administrator is recommended for the same reason.

"You can use app protection to prevent unauthorized persons from launching protected applications on your device. The applications can only be launched once the correct password has been entered.
Warning: Memorize the password well. If you forget it, you can no longer use your device fully."
"The app protection has been disabled because G DATA's App Checker is inactive."
Only launch protected applications after this password has been entered (at least four different, non-consecutive digits):
Enter the password used to enable protected applications to be launched. This password is also used for SMS commands (see Lost/Stolen).
Or answer the following security question:
Set a security question as well. If you subsequently answer the question correctly, you can use it to disable app protection so protected applications can be launched without using the password.
Send password to the preset email address?
Do you want to save or reject your modifications?

"App protection prevents unauthorized persons from launching protected applications on your device.
"
Press the + icon in the title bar to select the apps you want to protect.
Press the + icon in the title bar to select the apps you want to use without password protection.

"App protection prevents unauthorized persons from launching protected applications on your device. As a result of the current setting, all apps are protected by default.
"

"Dear Customer,
You have successfully configured your email address. Many thanks.
With kind regards, G DATA Software AG"
The email could not be sent. Please check the Internet connection and the email address.
The test email was successfully sent!
Sorry, that was not the correct answer.
Sorry, that was not the correct password.

This WLAN may have been compromised. If you are currently connected to a public WLAN or another unsecure network, we recommend disconnecting.

Touch the + icon in the title bar to add new contacts.
This G DATA product was closed unexpectedly. Would you like to report this error to G DATA?
Permissions will help prevent you from unintentionally uninstalling ##app_name## and will thus ensure protection.
Permissions are required to lock lost devices, wipe them clean or reset the device password.
Your device is already registered in the G DATA ActionCenter.
"As of Android Lollipop G DATA's App Checker needs to be enabled. Please activate the service in the system settings."
The G DATA AppChecker is required for Mobile Device Management on Android Lollipop and newer. Please activate the service in system settings.
You will now be forwarded to the system settings. Please activate the G DATA App Checker there.
You will now be forwarded to the system settings. Please deactivate the G DATA App Checker there.
Permission to download updates transferred successfully.
Another device has permission to load updates. This device does not have permission to load updates.
Another device has permission to load updates. Please manually launch an update to transfer the permission to this computer.
Update failed: the files you downloaded are corrupt.
The update server cannot currently be accessed. Please try again later.
Update failed: the signatures you downloaded could not be installed.
The customer data has not been accepted. Please enter a valid address.
Update failed: the access data is invalid.
Another device has permission to load updates. It is not possible to transfer the permission to this device. Please contact support.
The access rights are time-limited and have expired.
Your ##app_name## license is no longer valid!
Your ##app_name## license is no longer valid. Please launch the update manually to receive more information.
The most recent connection attempt to the remote management server failed. Please contact your administrator.
Update failed. No access data available. Please contact your administrator.
There is no update available. You have the current version.
This license is restricted to a certain territory. The device on which you want to register the license is not located in this territory. Please contact your supplier.
The update server cannot currently be accessed. Please try again later.
The product has already been registered.
There is currently no offer available for your product.
You have already run all updates. No additional updates are possible.
You do not have authorization to load updates.
An SMS connection could not be established. Please make sure your device can send SMS messages.
The server could not be reached. Please check the network connection.
No access data has yet been entered.
The update could not be run. Please check that there is enough storage space.
Not all the required data has been entered correctly.
Another device has permission to load updates. Should the permission be transferred to this device?
The signatures have been updated. ##app_name## is now fully up-to-date!
Should all infected files be deleted?
The device will regularly be checked for viruses.
Signature updates are regularly run in the background.
Enables remote administration of the device.
It is not possible to delete a file because of the device configuration. Try connecting the device to a PC and using it to delete the file.
Should the filters in conflict be disabled, or should this one remain inactive?
The SMS-Filter is no longer supported in Android 4.4 or later versions.

An attempt to compromise your mobile device with a USSD control code has been blocked.
The phone URL you tried to access is not a USSD control code and can be dialed without risk.
To prevent damage to your mobile device, caused by USSD control codes, select this app when the dialog appears below.
Starting with Android 4.4 and later, the SMS messaging is no longer concealable. Other parts of the privacy are still working.

The telephone app is approved for emergency call numbers. All other numbers will be blocked.
Access to this application has been restricted for your security.

"The %s app may only be restarted tomorrow. Parents can extend the period by pressing and holding the icons."
Press Back again to exit the configuration.
Incoming calls are blocked. Outgoing calls can be made as long as a telephone app is approved.

Press the + icon in the title bar to add the URLs to the relevant list.

"30 day free trial!
All premium functions for free for 30 days, just enter your name and email address."

"A Panic Button helps you send a message, for example, to quickly and easily inform friends of your current location in case of emergency.
These are set up as new widgets via the home screen.
"

"Dear Sir or Madam, You have been set up as an emergency contact by our customer #4# and are therefore receiving the current coordinates of his/her telephone.
#0#The last known position of the telephone is #1#. Please follow link #2# or #3# for a map view. Note: The MAC address of the last used router is #4#.
With kind regards G DATA Software AG"

"Dear Sir or Madam, You have been set up as an emergency contact by our customer (#4#) and are therefore receiving the current coordinates of his/her telephone.
#0#The current position of the telephone is #1#. Please follow link #2# or #3# for a map view. Note: The MAC address of the last used router is #5#.
With kind regards G DATA Software AG"

"Dear Sir or Madam, You have been set up as an emergency contact by our customer #4# and should therefore receive the current position of his/her telephone. Unfortunately it cannot be located at this time.
#0# Note: The MAC address of the last used router is #5#.
With kind regards G DATA Software AG"
"The last known position of #1#'s telephone was #2#."
"\#1#'s telephone has been found at coordinates #2#."
>#0##4# Telephone could not send the current position.

\##app_name## has denied access to this website.
The website is a known phishing site.
Web protection prevents phishing attacks via the Android and Chrome browser. Please note that protection against phishing attacks is not possible in incognito mode.

"'Phishing' involves attempts to acquire personal data such as login names, passwords, credit cards number, bank account details etc using fake websites or unsolicited email. The majority of phishing attempts targets customers of banks offering online banking, payment services, Internet service providers or online shops. The victim is often directed to visit fake websites, which look almost identical to the originals, via email or instant messenger."
Please check your account settings or try again later.
Show license details for open source software

\##app_name## secures your device and data not just when browsing the web but also by checking new apps for potential threats.

By registering an account you automatically receive 30 days access to the premium features of Internet Security. After this period, you still have access to the basic features, such as malware protection. The premium features can be unlocked at any time through a subscription.
This password is required for theft and app protection (at least four different, non-sequential numbers)
Forgot your password? You can reset it via SMS command using this number. SMS is sent to this number if the SIM card is changed.
Responses to SMS commands are also sent to your email address.
Welcome to your new wizard for better security. Do you just want to try our product, or do you already have a license?

"You can use theft protection to locate your device via SMS or lock and wipe it if it gets lost. Automatic functions send a notification if your SIM card has been changed or report the device's last known position if the battery runs out."
Enable uninstall protection, to prevent unauthorized uninstalls (requires the device administrator to be enabled)
The visible area of the map (location) corresponds to the level of efficiency and can be changed by zooming in/out.
